entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow. High minus 10 with temperature falling to minus 16 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Periods of snow beginning in the morning. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 10 with temperature falling to minus 16 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning and minus 23 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 18.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending near midnight then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 18. Wind chill minus 22 in the evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 31 January 2023
